name: headwind
description: An opinionated class sorter for Tailwind CSS
author: Ryan Heybourn <ryan@heybourn.com>

headwind.defaultSortOrder.description: Sort order: A string array that determines the default sort order.

headwind.classRegex.description: Class regex: A string that determines the default regex to search a class attribute.

headwind.runOnSave.description: An option which controls whether headwind will automatically run on save

headwind.enableRemoveDuplicates.description: A flag which indicates whether Headwind should remove duplicate classes
